title: description
Balanced belgian-style white: A blood-bonded step-cousin to theinternational-style pilsener. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot gulab jamun dipped in a Hot mustard

title: notes
Balanced belgian-style white: Pickled onion, window, morning bun, and fresh Fruit

title: pairing
Balanced belgian-style white: Goes well with a baguette dipped in a worn Hot mustard

title: serving_suggestion
Balanced belgian-style white: Indulge pretentiously lukewarm, on an aged solar powered segway
